title: क्या केंद्र सरकार ने दिल्ली सरकार द्वारा दी गई महिलाओं के लिए मुफ्त मेट्रो की सवारी का प्रस्ताव खारिज कर दिया?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Delhi CM: Legally Delhi govt doesn't need to send a proposal to Centre regarding free ride for women on Delhi Metro. Both Delhi Metro & Delhi govt ready to work on this proposal. Being the Delhi CM, I assure women of Delhi that we will implement free metro ride for women in Delhi https://t.co/CnwNYtM6M6
